Title: Why're You Hitting Yourself?
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Andrew Secunda, Sally Bradford, Stacey Harman (staff writer), Kristopher Valentine (staff writer)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: As Beverly tries playing matchmaker for Pops, Adam and Barry bond over their discovery of a scrambled porn channel on TV.
